attributes.action: proper birth and death certificates for all stillborn babies born  between 14 weeks to 40 weeks
attributes.additional_details: give a proper birth and a death certificate to all stillborn babies born between 14 to 40 weeks and ban the stillbirth certificate it is insensitive an offensive to hear those world stillborn I gave birth to my baby at 28 weeks and the treatment given to me after the death was appalling change all this  our baby's are  born and died not stillborn
